div.h2: Sr. Software Engineer, Apple Gift Card Engineering

li.title: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: The Gift Card Engineering team is looking for a software engineer passionate about building data intensive micro services and applications. Be part of a team working on challenging problems supporting Apple's Services business by delivering high volume, high performance, and high availability distributed transaction processing systems.

ul.li: Application development and design experience using object-oriented methodologies
Strong relational database skills, preferably Oracle
Hands on experience with REST APIs
Confidence working on UNIX and Linux platforms
Additional languages and platforms: shell scripting, Scala, HiveQL
Understanding of cryptography, digital signatures, PKI
Strong ability and enthusiasm to learn new technologies in a short time

div.p: Contribute to building and maintaining back-end data services and expose to enterprise wide and external consumers. Collaborate with other engineers on code reviews, internal infrastructure, and process enhancements. Research and stay abreast of the latest technology, be advocate of the best practices.
BS degree in computer science or equivalent field with 5+ years or MS degree with 3+ years experience, or equivalent
